Title: Successful login with valid credentials
Steps: Navigate to the login page | Enter registered email | Enter correct password | Click on the login button
Expected Result: User is successfully logged in and redirected to the dashboard.

Title: Login attempt with unregistered email
Steps: Navigate to the login page | Enter an unregistered email | Enter any password | Click on the login button
Expected Result: Error message displayed: 'Email not registered.'

Title: Login attempt with maximum length email
Steps: Navigate to the login page | Enter an email with maximum allowed length (e.g., 254 characters) | Enter correct password | Click on the login button
Expected Result: User is successfully logged in and redirected to the dashboard.

Title: Valid email format validation
Steps: Navigate to the registration page | Enter a valid email format (e.g., user@example.com) | Submit the form
Expected Result: Email format is accepted and the form is submitted successfully.

Title: Invalid email format validation
Steps: Navigate to the registration page | Enter an invalid email format (e.g., user@.com) | Submit the form
Expected Result: Error message displayed: 'Invalid email format.'

Title: Email with special characters
Steps: Navigate to the registration page | Enter an email with special characters (e.g., user+test@example.com) | Submit the form
Expected Result: Email format is accepted and the form is submitted successfully.

Title: Password meets minimum length requirement
Steps: Navigate to the registration page | Enter a password with 8 characters | Submit the form
Expected Result: Password is accepted and the form is submitted successfully.

Title: Password does not meet minimum length requirement
Steps: Navigate to the registration page | Enter a password with less than 8 characters | Submit the form
Expected Result: Error message displayed: 'Password must be at least 8 characters long.'

Title: Password with exactly 8 characters
Steps: Navigate to the registration page | Enter a password with exactly 8 characters | Submit the form
Expected Result: Password is accepted and the form is submitted successfully.

Title: Account lock after 5 failed login attempts
Steps: Navigate to the login page | Enter valid email and incorrect password 5 times | Attempt to login again
Expected Result: User account is locked and an error message is displayed: 'Account locked due to multiple failed attempts.'

Title: Login attempt after account lock
Steps: Navigate to the login page | Enter valid email and incorrect password 5 times to lock the account | Wait for a few seconds | Attempt to login with correct credentials
Expected Result: Error message displayed: 'Account is locked. Please contact support.'

Title: Lock account with exactly 5 failed attempts
Steps: Navigate to the login page | Enter valid email and incorrect password 5 times | Attempt to login with correct credentials
Expected Result: User account is locked and an error message is displayed: 'Account locked due to multiple failed attempts.'

Title: Forgot password sends reset email
Steps: Navigate to the login page | Click on 'Forgot Password' link | Enter registered email | Submit the form
Expected Result: Reset email is sent to the registered email address.

Title: Forgot password with unregistered email
Steps: Navigate to the login page | Click on 'Forgot Password' link | Enter an unregistered email | Submit the form
Expected Result: Error message displayed: 'Email not registered.'

Title: Forgot password with maximum length email
Steps: Navigate to the login page | Click on 'Forgot Password' link | Enter an email with maximum allowed length (e.g., 254 characters) | Submit the form
Expected Result: Reset email is sent to the registered email address.

Title: Display error message for invalid login
Steps: Navigate to the login page | Enter valid email and incorrect password | Click on the login button
Expected Result: Error message displayed: 'Invalid email or password.'

Title: No error message for valid credentials
Steps: Navigate to the login page | Enter valid email and correct password | Click on the login button
Expected Result: No error message is displayed.

Title: Error message for empty login fields
Steps: Navigate to the login page | Leave email and password fields empty | Click on the login button
Expected Result: Error message displayed: 'Email and password cannot be empty.'

Title: Login API response time under 2 seconds
Steps: Send a login request with valid credentials | Measure the response time
Expected Result: Response time is less than 2 seconds.

Title: Simulate high load to test response time
Steps: Simulate multiple concurrent login requests | Measure the response time for each request
Expected Result: At least one response time exceeds 2 seconds.

Title: Login API response time at boundary condition
Steps: Send a login request with valid credentials | Measure the response time to be exactly 2 seconds
Expected Result: Response time is exactly 2 seconds.
